chapter.title: Installation on Mac OS X
chapter.para: This section contains notes and hints specific to installing HHVM on Mac OS X. Currently Mac OS X has only interpreted support for HHVM (i.e., the JIT is not available). However, there is active development on getting full support for HHVM on Mac OS X.
There is no current prebuilt package. Only a compilation method to get HHVM working on Mac OS X. Compiling is similar to the Linux installation guide.

note.para: Mac OS X installation is currently EXPERIMENTAL and UNSUPPORTED.
